full_summary:
# Tender Announcement: Supplier Selection
### Acquisition of Calibration Targets for Hyperspectral Thermal Imaging

#### Notice Details

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Solicitation Number | WS3769908969 |
| Publication Date | 2023-03-22 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2023-03-22T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Number | 0 |
| Trade Agreements | CETA, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, WTO GPA, CPTPP, CCFTA, CFTA, CUFTA, CKFTA, NAFTA, Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement |

#### Tender Description

Defence Research and Development Canada (DRDC) is seeking the acquisition of calibration targets for thermal hyperspectral imaging. The acquisition includes delivery to Quebec, Quebec, as detailed in Annex A. This request for proposal (RFP) is being issued by PWPSC on behalf of DRDC.

#### Contract Details

| Attribute | Value |
| --- | --- |
| Contract Category | Goods and Services (GD) |
| Procurement Method | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| Selection Criteria | Lowest Price |
| Tender Status | Cancelled |

#### Contact Information

* Name: Julien, Lisa-Marie (SPAC/PWPSC)
* Email: [lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:lisa-marie.julien@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
* Address: 11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage, Gatineau, Quebec, K1A 0S5, Canada

#### Important Dates

* Tender closing date: 2023-03-22T14:00:00
* Contract Start Date: None
* Contract End Date: 2023-06-30
